channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Investment Manager Selection Is Hotting Up. Are You Ready for the Tough Questions?
item.description: Investment managers are being caught off guard by tougher questions from an increasingly sophisticated allocator market. Are you prepared for your next beauty parade?

item.title: Janet Yellen says lowering carbon emissions is the ‘single greatest economic opportunity’ of the century
item.description: Fighting climate change requires a global investment of $3 trillion annually through 2050, Yellen said.

item.title: Measuring Corporate Impact: The Gold Is in the Details
item.description: Do the products and services of the companies you invest in create negative or positive material outcomes?

item.title: It’s been exactly a year since the Fed’s last rate hike, and these parts of the economy are finally feeling the squeeze
item.description: “Things have softened in the last couple months, and Fed officials are going to be pretty concerned if they start softening more rapidly.”

item.title: Is Widespread Crypto Adoption Inevitable?
item.description: New technologies always face resistance, but demographic shifts imply there is a fierce tailwind behind crypto adoption, politically, economically, and financially.

item.title: It’s not 8 glasses a day anymore. Here’s how much water you should drink each day
item.description: If you’re drinking eight 8-ounce cups of water a day you’re doing well, but you could likely benefit from some adjustments.

item.title: Book Review: Shocks, Crises, and False Alarms
item.description: Carlsson-Szlezak and Swartz attempt to add fresh thinking on framing macro shocks that may often prove to be false alarms. Any general reader will obtain some key fresh insights with this work, and CFA charterholders will be offered an alternative to the conventional Wall Street approach to macro discussions.

item.title: The top-performing movie theater for ‘Twisters’ survived a massive tornado in 2013
item.description: “The people who live in Tornado Alley have a certain defiance towards mother nature.”

item.title: Preserving the Dollar: The Role of CBDCs in Securing Economic Stability for Future Generations
item.description: As financial systems evolve, preserving the US dollar's dominance will require skillful policy management and the integration of cutting-edge technologies.

item.title: Kamala Harris has these 3 men on her short list of potential running mates
item.description: Harris is expected to make a selection by Aug. 7, in order to align with the party’s plan to virtually nominate a ticket by that date.
